subTitle: But... But... Why?
definition: Why would I want to have multiple strategies within a trading system, when only one of them may trade at any given moment?
paragraph1: Before answering the burning question, let's take a look at a couple of examples, to make things clearer!
callOut: Take a look at the two strategies within the Weak-hands Buster (WHB v2) trading system! Explore the definitions of the ->Trigger Stage-> and see if you notice the difference between the two strategies.
tip: There's a hint in the name of each strategy!
